trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Gonuhanu is fidgeting with nervousness.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the distracted Hanu and slay any beasts that appear.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the distracted Hanu again.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_TODO_02<tab>Report to Gonuhanu.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_000<tab>Oh... Where could he be?
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_001<tab>Y-You there! You look fierce enough to brave the untamed wilds. Please, I'm in dire need of help...
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_002<tab>A friend of mine journeyed southwest to Cave Kikitola a while ago, and still hasn't returned. I'm beginning to fear the worst has happened...

TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_003<tab>While it's likely he's simply lost track of time staring at the rainbow moss, I keep thinking about all the beasts skulking about... Please check up on him for me, if only to set my heart at ease.

TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_004<tab>I'll stay here in case he comes back, but in the meantime, visit the cave and search for him. I wager no other Hanu will be nearby, so he shouldn't be hard to spot.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_005<tab>My friend likely got caught up in the beauty of Cave Kikitola, but I would be grateful if you could check up on him. I will stay here in case he returns.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_CAREFREEHANUHANU05067_000_006<tab>Ah, these waters get more beautiful every time I come...
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>Sensing a distracted prey, creatures move in for the kill!
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_CAREFREEHANUHANU05067_000_008<tab>What was that noise? Can't I gaze at the moss in peace...?
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_CAREFREEHANUHANU05067_000_009<tab>Wait, you're...you helped us bring back Ihih'hana! You're a friend of Wuk Lamat, yes? What are you doing in this cave?
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_CAREFREEHANUHANU05067_000_010<tab>Fiends, here? Oh, I didn't even hear them until the commotion was nearly over...
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_CAREFREEHANUHANU05067_000_011<tab>I owe you thanks for your courage! And now that my reverie has been broken, I should return to my friend. He must be worried sick.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_013<tab>He returned! He looked slightly unsettled, but none the worse for wear otherwise.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_014<tab>That cave is where we gather the rainbow moss used in our medicines. It has long been held sacred as a healing spot due to its tranquil scenery.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_015<tab>I haven't been since the great storm, and was worried that perhaps it had suffered damage in the floods... I am glad to hear that nothing has changed.
TEXT_KINGZC008_05067_GONUHANU_000_016<tab>But more than anything, I'm glad my friend returned safely. Had you not come along, the day may have been much darker!
